import React from 'react'; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

By using the Employee Management System (EMS), you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. Please read these terms carefully before using the EMS.

1. Account Registration

To access certain features of the EMS, you will need to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate and complete.

2. Privacy and GDPR Compliance

The EMS is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. Our data processing practices comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We collect and process your personal data for the purpose of managing employee information, leave requests, and other HR-related activities.

For more details on how we handle your personal data, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

3. Acceptable Use

You agree not to use the EMS for any unlawful purpose or any purpose prohibited by these terms. You may not use the EMS in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the EMS or interfere with any other party's use and enjoyment of the EMS.

4. Changes to Terms

EMS reserves the right to modify or replace any part of these terms. It is your responsibility to check these terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of the EMS following the posting of any changes to these terms constitutes acceptance of those changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at support@ems.com.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
